attributes.action: University of Birmingham Econ206B Econometrics Scandal
attributes.additional_details:
Overall, we feel that our ability to perform in this test was compromised by inadequately teaching throughout the term, through lectures that didn’t match the syllabus or notes, through a mock exam that only created confusion and through an exam that expected more than any student could have been justifiably expected to do.

We hope you take these concerns seriously and that the appropriate steps are taken to ensure we do not suffer as a result of events beyond our control, and that the same does not happen to future students.
